data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions_AccountKey
data.value: The account key used to access the Azure blob storage account.
data.comment: The description provided for the AccountKey parameter on AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions_AccountKeyName
data.value: The name of the account key used to look up the value from the Egress options Properties map.
data.comment: The description provided for the AccountKeyName parameter on AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions_AccountUri
data.value: The URI of the Azure blob storage account.
data.comment: The description provided for the AccountUri parameter on AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions_BlobPrefix
data.value: The prefix to prepend to the blob name.
data.comment: The description provided for the BlobPrefix parameter on AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions_ContainerName
data.value: The name of the container to which the blob will be egressed. If egressing to the root container, use the "$root" sentinel value.
data.comment: The description provided for the ContainerName parameter on AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions_SharedAccessSignature
data.value: The shared access signature (SAS) used to access the Azure blob and optionally queue storage accounts.
data.comment: The description provided for the SharedAccessSignature parameter on AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions_SharedAccessSignatureName
data.value: The name of the shared access signature (SAS) used to look up the value from the Egress options Properties map.
data.comment: The description provided for the SharedAccessSignatureName parameter on AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions_QueueAccountUri
data.value: The URI of the Azure queue storage account.
data.comment: The description provided for the QueueAccountUri parameter on AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions_QueueName
data.value: The name of the queue to which a message will be dispatched upon writing to a blob.
data.comment: The description provided for the QueueName parameter on AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions_ManagedIdentityClientId
data.value: Client id of the Managed Identity used for authentication. The identity must have permissions to create containers and write to blob storage.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions_Metadata
data.value: A mapping of metadata keys to environment variable names. The values of the environment variables will be added as metadata for egressed artifacts.
data.comment: The description provided for the Metadata parameter on AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions_QueueSharedAccessSignature
data.value: The shared access signature (SAS) used to access the Azure queue storage account.
data.comment: The description provided for the QueueSharedAccessSignature parameter on AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions_QueueSharedAccessSignatureName
data.value: The name of the queue shared access signature (SAS) used to look up the value from the Egress options Properties map.
data.comment: The description provided for the QueueSharedAccessSignatureName parameter on AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_CommonEgressProviderOptions_CopyBufferSize
data.value: Buffer size used when copying data from an egress callback returning a stream to the egress callback that is provided a stream to which data is written.
data.comment: The description provided for the CopyBufferSize parameter on all egress provider options.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions_UseWorkloadIdentityFromEnvironment
data.value: Uses WorkloadIdentity for authentication. The environment variables AZURE_CLIENT_ID, AZURE_TENANT_ID, AZURE_FEDERATED_TOKEN_FILE, and AZURE_AUTHORITY_HOST are used to authenticate.
